options: ['Wonderful clown shows.', "Bognor Regis' clown festval.", 'A beautiful town, Bognor Regis.', 'The first International Clown Festival.']
questions: What is the best title of the passage?
article:
Bognor Regis is a small beautiful town in the UK. From March 12 to 17 of each year, lots of clowns   get together in the town to celebrate the International Clown Festival. The first one was in 1987.
During the festival, people can see all kinds of clowns. They are together for the clown shows. They have big feet, red noses and look really funny. They sing and dance in a strange way to make people happy. Children like this interesting festival best. Now women can take part in the clown shows and they're very popular. But in the past, only men could be clowns.
